basics.name: Diego Miguel Parra Nava
basics.label: DevOps & Infrastructure Engineer
basics.summary: A results-driven DevOps and Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience and a background in electrical engineering. Proven expertise in designing, building, and maintaining scalable and reliable infrastructure on GCP. Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect with a passion for automation, CI/CD, and improving developer productivity.

highlights: Led critical migration tasks (AWS to GCP), including creating Packer images for VMs with Ansible, deploying Kafka clusters, and managing MongoDB replication.
Engineered and deployed infrastructure using Terraform, while managing Kubernetes deployments with ArgoCD.
Developed and maintained monitoring and alerting systems with Grafana, Prometheus, and Victoriametrics.
Authored and executed disaster recovery plans, successfully mitigating a critical production issue over a weekend.
Entrusted with project management responsibilities, overseeing operations independently during key periods.
Successfully helped resolve complex kubernetes deployment issues when porting EKS workloads to GKE.
Assisted with modernization efforts for a critical migration project by implementing infrastructure-as-code (IaC) and CI/CD best practices.
Significantly improved developer experience by automating release processes and optimizing CI/CD pipelines for faster, more reliable deployments.
Redesigned backend architecture, migrating from Flask to Express.js (Node.js) to support a transition from a Flask templating system to a React + Express stack.
Optimized Python data extraction scripts, reducing execution time by over 70% (from 3+ minutes to 45 seconds).
Designed and implemented a relational database to store and process Trello board data, enabling structured data analysis.
Developed and integrated authentication and a role-based access system, securing user permissions across the web application.
Helped the frontend dev resolving integration issues, debugging and optimizing API communication.

projects.name: resumeJson
projects.description: A multi-component system for parsing resumes into JSON Resume schema with a focus on CI/CD and DevOps.
highlights: Set up a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions for Docker builds, testing, and deployments.
Automated testing with Vitest and NGINX-hosted reports stored in a GCP bucket.
Managed infrastructure using OpenTofu with automated planning and manual apply approvals.
Developed a React frontend for Google OAuth registration, API key management, and quota tracking.
Encapsulated core business logic in a shared lib package using hexagonal architecture.

projects.name: Waypaper Engine
projects.description: Open-source wallpaper manager tool and setter for Linux, with external script support, custom playlists, and a fully-fledged CLI with 200+ stars on GitHub.
highlights: Closed 20+ issues.
Added 15+ features since the first release.
Published in the Arch Linux User Repository.
Built with Electron, Nodejs, React, and Bash.
